attributes.action: stop the adding of VAT to childrens clothes just because they pass a size limit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When childrens feet pass the size of 6 we get charged VAT on their shoes.  The same applies with clothing. I believe that if a child needs clothes, no matter what the size, we should not have to pay VAT while they are still in full-time education.
